ActCanada Labour Code
PrecisRegulations Amending the CANADA LABOUR STANDARDS REGULATIONS by inserting references to compassionate care leave, by revising the lists of Bell Canada and Canadian Pacific Limited offices and work sites used for the purposes of sections 212 and 214 respecting the permanent lay-off of groups of 50 or more, and by updating the list of minimum labour standards set out in Schedule II which employers must display at work sites.
